head.title: Zúme Coaching - Transform from Disciple to Disciple-Maker | Free Mentorship
head.description: Olympic athletes have coaches. Disciple-makers need them too. Get free, personalized coaching to multiply disciples and create sustainable movements. Start your transformation today.
head.keywords: Zume coaching, disciple making, free coaching, spiritual mentorship, multiplication movements, Christian coaching, discipleship training

hero.subtitle: "Olympic Athletes Have Coaches. Disciple-Makers Need Them Too."
hero.headline: Transform from Disciple to Disciple-Maker with Personalized Coaching
hero.description: Get free, volunteer-driven mentorship from experienced practitioners who have successfully multiplied disciples. Break through barriers and create sustainable multiplication movements in your unique context.

chat.message_1: "Let's work on your testimony this week. What's your story?"
chat.message_2: "I'm nervous about sharing with my coworkers..."
chat.message_4: "This is really helping! I feel more confident."

features.title: What Makes Zúme Coaching Different?
features.subtitle: Unlike traditional discipleship programs, we focus on practical implementation and multiplication outcomes
features.phase_leave_description: Graduate to become a coach yourself

card1.title: Personalized Coach Matching
card1.description: Get matched with coaches who speak your language, understand your culture, and have relevant ministry experience.

card2.title: Competency-Based Development
card2.description: Focus on developing skills and building competence, not just gaining knowledge. Master all 22 Zúme training elements.

card3.title: Cultural & Contextual Adaptation
card3.description: Learn to adapt biblical principles to your specific cultural and social context for maximum impact.

card4.title: Volunteer-Driven Authenticity
card4.description: Coaches are driven by passion, not profit. Authentic relationships focused on kingdom impact.

benefits.title: Proven Results: From Learning to Multiplying
benefits.description: Zúme Coaching has helped thousands of ordinary believers create extraordinary kingdom impact through systematic skill development and practical application.

item1.title: Confidence Building:
item1.description: Overcome impostor syndrome through guided practice

item2.title: Practical Application:
item2.description: Transform theory into actual disciple-making conversations

item5.title: Fourth Generation Impact:
item5.description: Successfully train others who train others

testimonials.title: What Our Coaches and Participants Say

card1.quote: "Zúme Coaching provides the missing link between learning biblical principles and actually multiplying disciples in real life. Our global teams have seen remarkable transformation."

card2.quote: "The coaching relationship ensures you successfully implement these principles to create sustainable multiplication movements in your unique context."

card3.quote: "A wonderful on-ramp for our coalition. The volunteer coach model ensures sustainability and authenticity while maintaining accessibility."
